intro:
PAC-MAN™ VS. (Free Multiplayer-only Ver.) is a free download from Nintendo eShop which allows you to play PAC-MAN™ VS. with another player who owns NAMCO MUSEUM™ for the Nintendo Switch™ console.

Become Pac-Man or a ghost and challenge up to 3 other players* in classic gameplay with a multiplayer twist! 

*Two Nintendo Switch™ consoles will be required for 4 player gameplay.
